question: Which of the following statement is not correct on Advanced Shipping Note (ASN)?
answers: ASN is an mandatory document to be sent from the supplier to the customer
ASN is used to inform the customer regarding the shipping transit details
ASN is used to manage their production flow based on the ASN
Hazard is about purposefully assessing the environment, risk is about controlling the probability of accidents happening

question: Which of the following item is not a term aligned with Muda?
answers: Quality checking of a product more than it is needed
MHE operator stored a pallet in location X and moved the same pallet to location Y  as per the request of his supervisor
Employee is working overtime continuously to complete his workload
Maintaining expired products in the warehouse

question: Which of the following statement is correct on risk and hazards?
answers: Hazard is something that can cause any harm, Risk is the probability that  the hazard can actually cause someone an injury
Hazard is the probability of getting injured, Risk is the entity that can cause any harm
Hazard is about purposefully assessing the environment, risk is about controlling the probability of accidents happening
Hazard is about identifying less risk work patterns, Risk is identifying possible causes to occur accident

question: John works in receiving activity. He received a truck containing 32 pallet of boxes. Each pallet is built with 40 boxes. In one box 48 items are stored. John inspected that one pallet is short of 3 boxes. John has to record the number of items received to the warehouse. What is the total number of items received?
What country has the highest life expectancy?
Which language has the more native speakers: English or Spanish?
What car manufacturer had the highest revenue in 2020?
Roald Amundsen was the first man to reach the South Pole, but where was he from?
